title: Booklets and Brochures
short_description: Promote your product & services or educate & update your audience with our range of printed printed saddle stitched or wiro bound booklets. From 50 Booklets Available in 6 standard sizes from A6 2 Binding options – Stapled (Saddle Stitched) or Wiro Bound Add Matt or Gloss Biodegradable Lamination to the cover REQUEST A PRICE LIST
full_description: Description Promote your product & services or educate & update your audience with our range of printed booklets. Our Saddle Stitched Brochures uses staples to bind the pages together for a sleek finish. Perfect for catalogues, training manuals magazines, newsletters and other marketing materials. Our Wiro Bound Brochures uses a sturdy metal white, black, silver or coloured spiral wire to bind the pages together. Perfect for documents, portfolios, workbooks and thicker catalogues you want to open and lay flat. From 50 Booklets Available in 6 standard sizes DL, A6, A5, A4, 148mm Square or 210mm Square Bespoke sizes available on request Portrait or landscape Bound on the Long Edge or Short Edge (Top or Side) Inside Pages: 130gsm, 170gsm or 250gsm Coated Silk or Uncoated Stock Add a thicker cover: 350gsm Coated Silk or Uncoated Stock Add Matt or Gloss Biodegradable Lamination to the cover Luxury and textured papers available 2 binding options – Choose Saddle Stitched if you’re looking for a stapled finish or wiro binding, in a range of white, black, silver or coloured wires Printed in full process colour Packaged in our high quality cardboard boxes Artwork / Design FREE artwork check on all supplied artwork Submit your PDF artwork via email to info@outpostcustom.co.uk Submit your text and logo file to our design team who will create your booklet using our standard template – Artwork fee applies to this method from £25+VAT. Set up your artwork in Canva and share it directly to info@outpostcustom.co.uk Download our FREE Indesign Template Speak to our Design Team for a quote on a bespoke design

title: Packaging Sleeves and Belly Bands
short_description: Create custom packaging or add the perfect finishing touch to your products with Belly Bands. From 50 Belly Bands Available in 6 standard sizes, or custom sizes Single or Double Sided From 160gsm-400gsm Coated Silk or Uncoated Stock Add Matt or Gloss Biodegradable Lamination Secure with a custom printed sticker, glue dot, tape or wax seal REQUEST A PRICE LIST
full_description: Description Create custom packaging or add the perfect finishing touch to your products with Belly Bands. An easy way to add branding and product info to your products. These paper sleeves work great for greetings cards, notebooks, soap, boxes and lots of other products. What is a Belly Band? Simply a long piece of paper, a Belly Band wraps around your product and is often secured with a printed sticker, glue dot, tape or wax seal. Personalised with your choice of paper and design, these are a cost effective way to add branding to a plain box, rather than the more costly option of a fully printed box. Belly Bands are also becoming a popular add on to Wedding Stationery to bundle invitations and other cards such as the RSVP. From 50 Belly Bands Available in 6 standard sizes Bespoke sizes available on request Single or Double Sided 170gsm , 250gsm or 350gsm Coated Silk Stock 160gsm, 300gsm or 400gsm Uncoated Stock Add Matt or Gloss Biodegradable Lamination Printed in full process colour Supplied flat un-creased Add pre-creasing Secure with a custom printed sticker, glue dot, tape or wax seal Packaged in our high quality cardboard boxes Sizes: 55mm x 210mm 55mm x 300mm 55mm x 420mm 100mm x 210mm 100mm x 300mm 100mm x 420mm Custom sizes up to 420mm long Remember – when working out what size Belly Band you will need, you need to overlap at some point so that you can fasten or secure it around your product with a sticker, tape or wax seal. We recommend that you have at least a 25mm of overlap to ensure you can secure your Belly Band. Add ons: Add matt or gloss lamination for extra durability Add pre-creasing Add printed stickers to secure your bands How can I fold and secure my Belly Bands? As standard our Belly Bands are supplied flat. We don’t pre-crease them, so that you can fold them to snugly fit around your product. However, for an additional fee, our production team can pre-crease them for you. You should have no problem folding them where you need to. If you need to be super precise and neat with this, you can always score them slightly with a pair of scissors or manual creasing tool to achieve the best result. We can supply you everything you need to secure the bands. For an invisible option, a glue dot works well. Or you could make more of a statement and add your choice of sticker to complete the look. short_description: A funeral service memorial sign will help you create a beautiful and touching tribute to your loved one. A3, A2 or A1 Card or 3mm Foamex Quick turn around Free direct delivery to you or your Funeral Directors Need a way to display your sign? Hire a frame or easel from us REQUEST A PRICE LIST
full_description: Description A funeral service memorial sign will help you create a beautiful and touching tribute to your loved one. Posters and signs can be placed at the front of the congregation during the service to add a personal touch to the ceremony. Our design team will help you put together the perfect tribute to your loved one. A funeral memorial or welcome sign can include photographs of the individual throughout their life. Family members may also choose to include tributes, eulogies, or other personalised messages from family and friends. We have a range of templates available or we can design a bespoke and personal sign. You can trust that our signs will meet your budget and ensure a fitting tribute to your loved one. Ordering your funeral signs direct with a print company is significantly more budget friendly than through your Funeral Director. A3, A2 or A1 Portrait or Landscape A3 Freestanding sign to display on an easal: 400gsm uncoated card or Foamex To go in a frame: 250gsm coated paper A2 or A1 Freestanding sign to display on an easal: Foamex To go in a frame: 250gsm coated paper Printed in full process colour Need an easel or frame to display your sign?
